snippet: In an interview with the Russian newspaper, “Kommersant,” Ms. Osipova gave the same reason for her move from the Mikhailovsky to the Royal as she did for her move from the Bolshoi to the Mikhailovsky: Repertoire.
abstract: In an interview with the Russian newspaper, “Kommersant,” Ms. Osipova gave the same reason for her move from the Mikhailovsky to the Royal as she did for her move from the Bolshoi to the Mikhailovsky: Repertoire.

headline.main: Russian Ballerina Natalia Osipova Joins London's Royal Ballet
